async get_transactions(limit: int | None, search_after: str | None = None, search_before: str | None = None) → List[BlockExplorerTransaction][source]

Get transactions from block explorer. Supports pagination.

Parameters:

  • limit – Maximum transaction pagination.

  • search_after

  • search_before

Returns:

List of block explorer type transaction objects.
